The Art and Science of Finding Talent
Connecting high-level talent to the best companies worldwide.

About us

Headquartered in Switzerland with offices across Europe, we streamline the entire executive recruitment process by employing tried and tested methods saving time and empowering our clients to stay focused on their core competencies.

Right now, the demand for skills across a wide range of disciplines is massive, creating enormous issues regarding delivery times on migrations, development projects and maintenance. This shortage needs answering using a combination of recruitment methods as no single method can be effectively employed to ensure our client’s demand continuity.

Our background and expertise across various creative methodologies allow us to meet guaranteed project deadlines so that our client’s experience enjoy a high production level and peace of mind.

MORE ABOUT US

Looking for a job?

Acquism assists you in reaching your professional aspirations by streamlining your job hunt for roles that emphasise your global competencies. Partnering with a reputable recruitment agency not only strengthens your application, but also connects you to an extensive network of businesses, both large and small, across Switzerland and beyond. To take advantage of this opportunity, browse our available positions and submit your CV to our European database.

Looking to hire?

We have many years of experience in attracting and selecting high- quality Candidates on behalf of our clients across a wide range of technologies and industry verticals, adapting our services in each search to deliver based on their preferred sourcing mechanisms and timeframes.

We are consistently considered a top-tier supplier to many large organisations with MSP and PSL programs.

Speak to one of our experts today for rapid access to the most sought digital, analytics and technology talent and to discuss how we can tailor a program to guarantee your desired results.
